2025 Osaka Expo pavilions Notion template

05 May 2025

While planning my visit to the Osaka (Kansai, Japan) World Expo, I came across this planning guide, from this very useful video.
This guide helps me a lot, especially to work with the complex lottery system for pavilion reservations.

I converted and updated the Google sheet into a Notion document. Feel free to duplicate it:

2025 Osaka Expo pavilions Notion template

Post scriptum, I spotted the guide on this Reddit post from r/OsakaWorldExpo. I recommend this subreddit for valuable insights and personal feedback from expo visitors.
